Trade/Device Name(s): FORA V20 Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for FORA V20 Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood using electrochemical biosensor technology
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from finger and alternative sites to aid diabetes monitoring; not for diagnosis or screening of diabetes mellitus or for use on neonates
